TopicTitle: Should There be Interior Corridors For KSP Stations and other Ships?

Articles.Content: i think it would be an incredible feature if you could have corridors that you could walk around in and put things in. i know it would be difficult to deliver this feature but it would be astonishing to see it in future updates, who agrees?

Curently outdated mods "zzz Crosswalk/narrow passageway", "Hollow Structures And Hulls" and "Bavarian Aerospace" contain(ed) hollow corridors/catwalks.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/40207-Crosswalk-narrow-passageway](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/40207-Crosswalk-narrow-passageway)

I think there should be certain parts which Kerbals could transfer through and some that wouldn't allow it. Unless you're cool with imagining they get liquified and transported through some sort of piping system installed in trusses. A full IVA movement isn't really needed IMO.

Maybe (currently outdated ?) Connected Living Space is appropriate.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/70161-0-90-Up-for-adoption-Connected-Living-Space-v1-1-2-0-%2827th-Feb-2015%29-Hatches-and-Highlighting](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/70161-0-90-Up-for-adoption-Connected-Living-Space-v1-1-2-0-%2827th-Feb-2015%29-Hatches-and-Highlighting)
